name: My Small World (Unnatural Freaks Studio)
description:
This VR Experience was made as part of the VR Jam 2021. This was a solo endeavour that focuses on narrative and mixing 3D and 2D assets.

In this short story, you play as a child who creates a 'new world' for a school science project. 

WARNING: the following themes addressed in this experience may be distressing to some people. Please consider if this experience is appropriate for you.

Music by bensound.com: "Sad Day" ,  "Memories" , "Slow Motion"

Assets by Bec K. and SYNTY Studios.
